---
layout: post
category: deep_learning
title: Natural Language Processing
date: 2015-10-09
---

# Tutorials

![](/assets/deep_learning/NLP/Deep Learning For NLP.jpg)

[https://softwaremill.com/deep-learning-for-nlp/](https://softwaremill.com/deep-learning-for-nlp/)
